backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types (UserProfile, Question, Test, TestAttempt, LeaderboardEntry) and managing state for user profiles, questions, full syllabus tests, chapter-wise tests, test attempts, and leaderboards with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented PDF export functionality including generateResultPDF utility, PDF layout with Concept Delta branding, score summary section, and question-by-question breakdown with confidence levels and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including App.tsx, route tree, components (Layout, Navbar, Footer), pages (LandingPage, StudentDashboard, AdminDashboard, TestInterface, ResultPage, Leaderboard), hooks (useQueries, useQuestionMutations, useFullSyllabusTestMutations), and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system for light and dark themes with Concept Delta navy blue primary colors and comprehensive design tokens for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, SEO description for Concept Delta MHT-CET platform, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient, TanStack Router with route tree, ThemeProvider for dark/light mode, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding with delta symbol, quick links (Home, Dashboard, YouTube), social media handle, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component rendering Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer with flex column layout for full-height pages.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Concept Delta branding, responsive mobile menu toggle, Internet Identity login/logout functionality, and links to Dashboard and Admin pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterWiseTestMut: Provides React Query mutations for creating chapter-wise tests and assigning questions to them, with automatic query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: Exports mutations for creating full syllabus tests and assigning section-specific questions to them, invalidating related queries after successful operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider using @dfinity/auth-client, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, chapter-wise tests, questions, user profiles, test attempts, and leaderboards from the backend actor.
Provides a mutation hook for creating questions with text/image content, multiple-choice options, correct answer, explanation, subject, and class level.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: Exports mutations for starting and submitting test sections with answers, invalidating test attempt queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminChapterWiseTestC: Admin page for creating chapter-wise tests with configurable name, marks, duration, and question selection from all available questions, with form validation and success handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying analytics cards (users, tests, questions), tabs for test management (full syllabus and chapter-wise), question gallery, and user management. Uses Internet Identity for authentication and queries for fetching test data.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests by selecting questions from two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths). Handles test creation, question assignment, and provides validation with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin page for creating individual questions with text/image support for both questions and four options. Includes subject/class level selection, correct answer marking, explanation field, and image upload with base64 encoding.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero banner, feature cards, YouTube subscription prompt, and Telegram community section. Displays MHT-CET exam preparation platform benefits and handles user authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays top 10 test results in a leaderboard format with rank-based styling (gold/silver/bronze medals for top 3), showing user names, scores, and completion times. Requires authentication and fetches data by test ID.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Displays test results with score breakdown, performance metrics, and detailed answer review. Includes PDF export functionality and navigation back to dashboard or leaderboard.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student landing page showing available full syllabus and chapter-wise tests. Handles test initiation by creating attempts and starting sections before navigating to the test interface.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: Main test-taking interface with timer, question navigation, answer selection, and section submission. Manages transitions between sections and auto-submits when time expires.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure using TanStack Router, including routes for landing, dashboards, admin pages, test interface, results, and leaderboard.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Generates printable PDF reports of test results by creating formatted HTML content with scores, statistics, performance metrics, and detailed answer breakdowns for both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme for sidebar/chart/card components, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform, tracking architectural decisions (Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity auth), feature implementations (branding changes, hero images, landing page updates), and known issues around image storage and mobile responsiveness.
